activities: We collect the following information from an individual when they respond to one of our on-line assessments:  First Name, Last Name (optional), Company Name (Optional), Job Title (optional), Gender, Assessment Responses. The information collected is used to produce a profile report of that individual based upon the type of assessment to which they responded. The gender is only used to select the appropriate pronouns for the report.  We do not disclose personal information to third parties, except to the person or organization that requested the assessment.
contactoff1: Rick Bowers, Target Training International, Ltd.
